alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:52AM AKST until December 26 at 11:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing Rain. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 11 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and hazardous travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of very light freezing rain and/or drizzle with continue through Monday morning. Another round of freezing rain and/or drizzle expected to develop by early Monday afternoon and continue into Monday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
